title: Set public domain to growithtutor.com

requirements.text: Configure the React app to use the public domain "growithtutor.com" for public-domain-based URL generation (PUBLIC_DOMAIN / getPublicUrl / getPublicAssetUrl), ensuring production builds resolve to growithtutor.com rather than a different environment-provided value.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app is built for production with the projectâ€™s default configuration, `PUBLIC_DOMAIN` evaluates to `growithtutor.com`.
Any code paths that generate public URLs via `getPublicUrl(...)` / `getPublicAssetUrl(...)` produce `https://growithtutor.com/...` URLs.
No changes are made to read-only paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.

requirements.text: Ensure the standalone landing page domain configuration uses "growithtutor.com" consistently (the standalone public domain constant must be set to growithtutor.com).
acceptanceCriteria: Standalone landing page asset URLs constructed by the helper function resolve to `https://growithtutor.com/...`.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Configuring external DNS records for growithtutor.com.
Internet Computer custom domain/certificate setup steps outside the codebase.
